pages.text: A hard, volcanic mineral which safekeeps the trophies of ancient magma.$(br2)Findings described as: cataclysmic, ancient, indestructible.

Deep under the foundations of life, the most ancient of earthly artifacts are found embedded in the tempered crystal of our planet. Withstood through time that spans a surreal length, only the most sturdy of artifacts can find their way to the depths and survive the intense pressures and heat of the earth's molten heart - a credit to their value, or likely the hubris of the adventurers who carried them there.
